plot: General Debility is seduced by a lady spy who steals some secret plans. Meanwhile, Mrs. Debility hires Plump and Runt to serve him with divorce papers. The boys accidentally mix up the divorce papers and the secret plans.
title: Human Hounds
plot_es: General Debility is seduced by a lady spy who steals some secret plans. Meanwhile, Mrs. Debility hires Plump and Runt to serve him with divorce papers. The boys accidentally mix up the divorce papers and the secret plans.
plot_en: General Debility is seduced by a lady spy who steals some secret plans. Meanwhile, Mrs. Debility hires Plump and Runt to serve him with divorce papers. The boys accidentally mix up the divorce papers and the secret plans.
